About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Seeking Web Developer Career Opportunity.

Passionate to build things and always been curious and wanted to know how software operates behind an application system. I earned a Prince 2 Agile practitioner accreditation. I continue to practice programming and shapen my skills in web development.

  • 2013 HTML & CSS

    My first eyes opening to world wide web and the mark up and style sheet language to create web application.

  • 2015 Wordpress

    Built my own personal website using Wordpress. Understand and competent to work with any web application using Joomla as CMS.

  • 2017 Joomla

    Coordinated with external Joomla Developer to build the company website. Understand and competent to work with any web application using Joomla as CMS.

  • 2019 JavaScript

    Implement the front-end logic that defines the behavior of the visual elements of a web application. Connect application with the services that reside on the back-end.

  • 2019 Ruby on Rails

    Use RoR to create fullstack web application or use as backend language with other frontend Framework to build webapplications.

  • 2020 PostgresQl

    Utilise PostgreSQL as the primary data store or data warehouse for many web, mobile, geospatial, and analytics applications.

  • 2020 Advanced CSS & SASS

    Develop CSS Framework with reusable components using SASS. Advanced & Modern CSS Flexbox, Grid & Animations.

  • 2020 PHP

    Connect front-end work with the third-party web services. Use PHP script for contact form submission.
